A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It wasn't a perfect film but I enjoyed it a lot... some don't like the twists and turns. However they were perfect for storytelling and character arc. Most people who hate on this film are blind\, any sequel would be a disappointment to them. Sorry that the character you know and love don't always have sunshine and rainbows on his mind. It is not perfect\, but the goods outshine the bads. A movie for people who appreciate film will love\, and people who would like three hours of people standing and talking about the jedi order with jar jar binks will hate. Don't hate on the movie because you think it is cool to hate on it\, it just gives you as little depth as Anikan from the prequels.
